name: ios-dynamsoft-camera-sdk
summary: Developers can have complete control over a scanner, e.g., exposure, iris, auto focus, etc.
description: Dynamsoft Camera SDK provides Objec-C/Swift APIs that enable you to easily capture images and documents from iPhone Video Class (UVC) compatible webcams. It supports document edge detection from a video stream and processing features including perspective correction, noise removal, contrast, brightness, and color filter (convert to a colored/grey document).
